game_description: VR meets old school FPS meets Metroidvania. Set in an ancient temple that has been overrun by an army of undead minions. Blast, jump, and climb your way through this large seamless environment, and avoid being slain by the sentinel, an enemy that relentlessly hunts intruders.
review_1: If you're looking for an action packed shooter-metroidvania give this one a shot!
review_2: I won this game from a raffles from a streamer and I like this game I like the enemies graphics and combat itâ€™s really nice
